title.rendered: Gottwals Books Chase Grant + 40 Under 40 + Kid’s Corner

content.rendered:
Vote for Gottwals Books to win $250K in grants from Chase. Click here to vote for us! Just type “Gottwals Books” in the search bar and click vote now.

Congratulations to Shane Gottwals for being chosen as one of Georgia Trend magazine’s “40 Under 40”. He will be accepting his reward at the Fox Theatre tonight in Atlanta!

Kid’s Corner will be held at the Warner Robins location Thursday, October 24th at 10:30 a.m. Join us for a time of reading, activities, snacks and lots of fun!
